AboutSection.title: About
AboutSection.tagline: Full Stack Developer focused on building robust, secure, and scalable solutions.
AboutSection.firstParagraph: My name is Kleber, I'm a full stack developer with over 5 years of experience. I'm proficient in the Node.js ecosystem, working with React, Next.js, NestJS, PostgreSQL, Docker, and AWS, always focused on performance, scalability, and security. My goal is to turn complex ideas into real, functional, and impactful solutions.
AboutSection.secondParagraph: Iâ€™ve worked on client projects, always focused on results and clear communication with the team. I have an analytical mindset, take a proactive approach to problem-solving, and consistently strive to deliver clean, scalable code with a strong focus on the product.
